root.message: The QUALITY_ASSMNT field for indicator 2-c-1, translated into en
root.data: The responsible officer conducts a self-assessment of the calculation process and its outputs on the basis of the FAO Statistics Quality Assurance Framework (SQAF). The SQAF considers the following principles: relevance, accuracy and reliability, timelessness and punctuality, coherence and comparability, and accessibility and clarity.
